data.eml:eml: First report on the leafhopper genus Caknesia Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Typhlocybini) from China, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yalin, Huang, Min (2006): First report on the leafhopper genus Caknesia Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Typhlocybini) from China, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 1223: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172603
